attributes.action: ignore all petitions which simply air people's grievences that could be better sorted elsewhere
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Prime Minister. for all his faults, is only human and neither he nor his staff can look at every single problem on here and address each one. It's about time people took some responsibility, gained a bit of insight and perhaps realised that you can't just go to the top for every little moan.

If people actually took the effort to find out the best avenue for their problem, or better still stop moaning and be thankful they don't live in Burma or Democratic Republic of Congo, then this website would be reserved for only the biggest issues the prime minister can tackle. I realise this is one of those "minor gripes" but it is written in order to prevent hundreds more.
